name: Modify Group Policy Settings
description: Detect malicious GPO modifications can be used to implement many other malicious behaviors.
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.original_file_name:/[Rr][Ee][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Ii][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm].*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Yy][Rr][Ee][Ff][Rr][Ee][Ss][Hh][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Dd][Cc].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Yy][Rr][Ee][Ff][Rr][Ee][Ss][Hh][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Oo][Ff][Ff][Ss][Ee][Tt][Dd][Cc].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Yy][Rr][Ee][Ff][Rr][Ee][Ss][Hh][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Yy][Rr][Ee][Ff][Rr][Ee][Ss][Hh][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Oo][Ff][Ff][Ss][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Mm][Aa][Rr][Tt][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ee][Ee][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ss][Mm][Aa][Rr][Tt][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ee][Ee][Nn][Ll][Ee][Vv][Ee][Ll].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\reg.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:reg.exe) AND process.command_line:*\\SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\\System* AND process.command_line:(*GroupPolicyRefreshTimeDC* OR *GroupPolicyRefreshTimeOffsetDC* OR *GroupPolicyRefreshTime* OR *GroupPolicyRefreshTimeOffset* OR *EnableSmartScreen* OR *ShellSmartScreenLevel*))`
